Available at Marina Market, Made in Scandinavian, TotallySwedish, and ScanSpecialties in US. Swedish pickled herring widely available at specialty stores. Similar products from other Nordic brands already imported.

Sold by FJØRN Scandinavian, eBay, Etsy, and Nordic Nest (US shipping). Premium linen tea towels available from many US/European brands. Quality is exceptional but not unique enough to justify import business.

Available on Amazon US and Etsy but reviews note 'very difficult to find' and expensive. Mustard market extremely crowded (Grey Poupon, Dijon, specialty artisan). Swedish style not differentiated enough vs French/German mustards.

Cannot ship to US per Reddit (refrigerated product). US equivalent exists: Kozy Shack rice pudding cups widely available. Swedish style (risgrynsgröt-based) is different but cold chain logistics and US competition make this unviable.

Swedish vs Heinz debate exists but ketchup market saturated. Heinz dominates US with 60%+ share. Felix flavor differences (less sweet, different tomato) not distinct enough to justify import vs established Heinz/Hunt's/Annie's organic.
